title: Unbreakable Bonds Part 1: Introduction to
description: Unbreakable Bonds: The Introduction to the Sisters.Four ladies, four perspectives, loads of drama all intertwine and take you on an excursion filled with drama. This introduction details their journeys towards military service. Get to know the women before the suited up in camo.And get ready to one click and root for them in the full length story that follows this one void of cliffhangers, and simply a beginning, a middle, and a beautiful ending.
author: M.J. Sparks
